colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DAD PA DANG RNAM 'BYOD YUL TU BYUNG ZHING, RIGS GNAS RUM LA BLO BYED GONG DKAR RDO RJE GDAN PA CHOS MDZAD BSTAN 'DZIN DPA' PO ZHES BYA BA NYE GSOL BA BTAB PA LA BSTEN NAS, GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SBAS LUNG 'BRAS MO GSHONGS 'DAB CHAGS PA SOD PAR GNYIS KYI MTSAMS BSTAN SKYONG CHON PO'I MGUL MKHAR BU ZHES BYA BA'I YUL LJONGS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,LEGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
